name: D. Cow and Fields
statement:
Bessie is out grazing on the farm, which consists of n fields connected
by m bidirectional roads. She is currently at field 1, and will return
to her home at field n at the end of the day.The Cowfederation of Barns
has ordered Farmer John to install one extra bidirectional road. The
farm has k special fields and he has decided to install the road between
two different special fields. He may add the road between two special
fields that already had a road directly connecting them.After the road
is added, Bessie will return home on the shortest path from field 1 to
field n. Since Bessie needs more exercise, Farmer John must the length
of this shortest path. Help him!
